00027         GlobalEnvironment* gEnv;

00031         CCore::CCore()
00032                 : pCurrentEnvironment(&mEnvironment)
00033         {
00034                 memset(&mEnvironment, 0, sizeof(GlobalEnvironment));
00035 
00036                 gEnv = pCurrentEnvironment;
00037                 pCurrentEnvironment->Core = this;
00038         }
00039 
00041 
00042         void CCore::Initialize(const char* paramsFile)
00043         {
00044                 if(gEnv->PluginManager)
00045                         throw module::RuntimeException("Multiple Core initialization");
00046 
00047                 mLogModule.Init("Logging.dll");
00048                 create_instance(&gEnv->Logger, Logging::CLSID_CLogService, mLogModule);
00049                 gEnv->Logger->Initialize("Execution.log", "Error.log");
00050 
00051                 LogInfoAlways("[Init] Initializing core");
00052                 LogTrace("[Init] Creating plugin manager");
00053 
00054                 create_instance<CPluginManager>(&gEnv->PluginManager);
00055                 static_cast<CPluginManager*>(gEnv->PluginManager)->Run(paramsFile);
00056         }
00057 
00059 
00060         CCore::~CCore()
00061         {
00062                 LogInfoAlways("[Shutdown] Shutting down the core");
00063 
00064                 if(gEnv->PluginManager)
00065                         gEnv->PluginManager->Release();
00066 
00067                 if(gEnv->Logger)
00068                         gEnv->Logger->Release();
00069         }

00072 
00073         void CCore::StartExecution(int argc, char *argv[])
00074         {
00075                 try
00076                 {
00077                         StartExecution_actual(argc, argv);
00078                 }
00079                 catch(module::Exception& cex)
00080                 {
00081                         LogErrorAlways("%s: %s", cex.className(), cex.message());
00082                 }
00083                 catch(std::exception& stdex)
00084                 {
00085                         LogErrorAlways(stdex.what());
00086                 }
00087                 catch(...)
00088                 {
00089                         LogErrorAlways("Unrecognized exception");
00090                 }
00091         }
00092 
00094 
00095         void CCore::StartExecution_actual(int argc, char *argv[])
00096         {
00097                 IPluginShadow *pMyShadow = gEnv->PluginManager->FindPluginShadow("core");
00098                 IExtensionPoint *pStartListeners = pMyShadow->FindExtensionPoint("startlisteners");
00099                 size_t nextensions = pStartListeners->getExtensionCount();
00100 
00101                 for(size_t i = 0; i != nextensions; ++i)
00102                 {
00103                         IExtension *pEx = pStartListeners->getExtension(i);
00104                         LogTrace("[Startup] Notifying start listener: %s", pEx->Extender()->PluginName().c_str());
00105 
00106                         module::com_ptr<IStartListener> l;
00107                         pEx->Extender()->CreateInstance(pEx->ImplClassID(), UUID_PPV(IStartListener, l.wrapped()));
00108 
00109                         if(l)
00110                         {
00111                                 l->OnStart(argc, argv);
00112                         }
00113                         else
00114                         {
00115                                 LogErrorAlways("[Startup] Failed to create start listener's implementation: %s",
00116                                                                 pEx->Extender()->PluginName().c_str());
00117                         }
00118                 }
00119         }
00120 
00122 
00123         void CCore::RegisterEnvironment(GlobalEnvironment* newEnv)
00124         {
00125                 memcpy(newEnv, pCurrentEnvironment, sizeof(GlobalEnvironment));
00126                 pCurrentEnvironment = newEnv;
00127         }
